pull.title: [init] Clarify help message
pull.body: Also, I think this should be branched by `showDebug`.

events.body: Why debug? Message is better with the explicit "memory pool".
Tend to NACK for the `showDebug` wall, though ACK the text change. Explicitly mention "memory pool" might be good and could solve cure some wild thought.
Yes, new text is better, don't know about `showDebug`. It's a miner policy option, not so much a debugging one.
Addressed nits. (Let's leave the `showDebug` for later to clean up, if wanted)
